name: setup-rw-shad
description: Setup rw-shad in a RedwoodJS project

scripts.copypkgfiles: yarn cleannpx && cp README.md ./npx/ && cp package.json ./npx/
scripts.copyforrelease: yarn copypkgfiles && yarn copybin && yarn copytemplates
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: yarn build && npm version major && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Tobbe Lundberg
